description:
* Based on a shounen manga by http://anidb.net/cr9469 [Ookubo Atsushi] serialised in Shounen Gangan.
Set in the Shinigami technical school for weapon technicians, the series revolves around three pairs of two characters with each having a weapon technician and a human weapon. They try to make the latter a "Death Scythe" and thus fit for use by the Shinigami. They must collect the souls of 99 evil humans and one witch to do this.
[i]Note: There were two versions of Soul Eater. The first was a normal version which aired on Mondays and the second was a "Late Show" version which aired on Thursday nights. The "Late Show" version had some extra scenes added during eye-catches and before the next episode preview but the main part of the show didn`t have any differences from the normal version.
The series was rebroadcast on TV Tokyo under the title Soul Eater: Repeat Show (ソウルイーター リピートショー) from September 30, 2010, featuring new opening and closing themes.[/i]

REGULAR.description:
With 99 evil souls consumed, Soul just needs to defeat a witch to become a Death Scythe. He and Maka make their move against Blair - but a pointy hat doesn’t always mean witch!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die Seelenresonanz
L`eco dell`anima. Soul Eater, diventerai una falce della morte?
La résonance des âmes. Soul Eater, deviendras-tu Death Scythe ?
Resonance of the Soul: Will Soul Eater Become a Death Scythe?
Sielų Rezonansas
Tamashii no Kyoumei: Soul Eater, Death Scythe ni Naru?
魂の共鳴 ~ソウル=イーター, デスサイズになる?~

REGULAR.description:
A mobster and his goons are gunning for a witch, and Black☆Star and Tsubaki want the souls of all involved. Their plan runs into trouble when the witch’s bodyguard draws his sword.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Aš Tikrai Žvaigždė!
C`est moi la star ! Le plus géant des hommes entre en scène ?
I Am the Star!: The Big Man Is Showing Up Here?
Ich bin der Star
Ore Koso Star Da! Mottomo Big na Otoko, Koko ni Arawaru?
Sono io la star! Entra in scena il più grande di tutti?
俺こそスターだ! ~最もビッグな男, ここに現る?~

REGULAR.description:
Death the Kid, Patty, and Liz travel to the desert to battle a witch who’s raising the dead. If a horde of mummies doesn’t stop them, Kid’s freaky symmetry obsession might.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Il ragazzo perfetto. La splendida missione di Death the Kid?
Jung und perfekt

Le garçon parfait. La merveilleuse mission de Death the Kid ?
Mirties Vaikio didingoji misija
The Perfect Boy: Death the Kid`s Magnificent Mission?

REGULAR.description:
It’s a graveyard rumble when Maka, Soul, Black☆Star, and Tsubaki take on Sid. He used to be a respected teacher at the Academy, but now he’s a zombie - and he’s actively recruiting for the undead!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Attiva il Majogari. Un palpitante corso di recupero al cimitero?

魔女狩り発動!? ~ドキドキ墓場の補習授業?~

REGULAR.description:
Maka, Soul, Black☆Star, and Tsubaki tangle with the mad scientist responsible for turning Sid into a zombie - the amazingly powerful Dr. Stein!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die Form der Seele
La forma dell`anima. Arriva Franken Stein, il più forte maestro d`armi?

REGULAR.description:
Death the Kid shows up for his first day at Death Weapon Meister Academy, and Black☆Star and Soul decide to welcome him with closed fists instead of open arms.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ein Schüler mit Vorgeschichte
La tanto discussa matricole. L`indimenticabile primo giorno di Kid alla Shibusen?

REGULAR.description:
Maka and Soul’s trip to Italy turns ugly when they run into Crona and Ragnarok, a Meister and Weapon team that shares a highly unusual bond.

Soul is seriously injured and Maka’s fading fast. Death Scythe and Dr. Stein step in to make sure the weird rampage of Crona and Ragnarok comes to an end.

REGULAR.description:
Black☆Star and Death the Kid discover the worst part of searching for the legendary Excalibur: finding the legendary Excalibur.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die Legende vom Heiligen Schwert
La leggenda della sacra spada. La grande avventura di Kid e Black Star?

REGULAR.description:
Black☆Star and Tsubaki face Masamune, and as the battle against the dark Weapon escalates, it becomes clear that Tsubaki must finish the fight alone.
Source: crunchyroll

妖刀マサムネ ~破れ憑依[ひょうい]魂, 雨に詠[うた]う心?

REGULAR.description:
Black☆Star and Tsubaki will claim their first soul if they defeat Masamune - but if Tsubaki falls, she will be absorbed forever by her powerful and bitter brother.

REGULAR.description:
After seeing Soul’s new scar, Maka searches for the strength to keep her partner safe. It could be a tough prospect - the witch responsible for the wound is dangerously close.

titles.title: Courage That Beats Out Fear: Maka Albarn`s Great Resolution?

Un courage qui transcende la peur. La grande résolution de Maka Albarn ?
恐怖に負けない勇気 ~マカ=アルバーンの一大決心?

REGULAR.description:
Maka and Soul are having trouble syncing their wavelengths, a fact that proves problematic when they find themselves fighting an immortal werewolf.

titles.title: Der Mann mit dem Teufelsauge

Magan no Otoko: Soul to Maka, zure yuku Tamashii no Hachou?
The Man with the Magic Eye: Soul and Maka`s Diverging Soul Wavelength?
魔眼の男 ~ソウルとマカ, ズレゆく魂の波長?~

REGULAR.description:
There’s an important exam coming, and legend says whoever gets the highest grade is destined to reach Death Scythe. Maka won’t settle for anything but the best score.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: (Chou) Hikki shiken - Dokidoki, wakuwaku, sowasowa, usoon?
(超)筆記試験 ~ドキドキ, ワクワク, ソワソワ, ウソーン?

Il super esame scritto: batticuore, eccitazione, nervoso, bugie?
Le superexamen écrit. Excitation, agitation, nervosité, c`est pas vrai ?
The Super Written Exam: Heart-Pounding, Reeling, and Restless. You`re Kidding!?

REGULAR.description:
Death the Kid and the Thompson sisters board a ghost ship full of human souls. After facing the vessel’s demented captain, true evil unfurls its wings.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der Schwarze Drache, der Seelen frisst
Le dragon noir mangeur d`âmes. Liz la Froussarde et ses joyeux amis ?

REGULAR.description:
Unsettled by something he heard on the ghost ship, Kid asks his father an unimaginable question. Dr. Stein has his own questions regarding Medusa’s qualifications as a nurse.

titles.title: Feroce scontro sulla nave fantasma. L`inferno nella mia testa?

REGULAR.description:
Ox Ford triumphantly raises Excalibur to the heavens! Instead of fame and glory, he gets a painfully detailed account of Excalibur’s past lives and loves.

titles.title: Die Legende vom Heiligen Schwert 2

REGULAR.description:
A party to celebrate the founding of Death Weapon Meister Academy erupts into chaos when Medusa and her minions unleash an assault on the school.

titles.title: Alptraum auf dem Abendempfang
L`incubo Della Vigilia. E così si alza il sipario?
Le cauchemar le soir du festival. Le rideau se lèvera-t-il ?

REGULAR.description:
As her ghouls rush to unseal Asura, Medusa stands in the way of Dr. Stein and his students. Elsewhere, Maka decides to settle it once and for all with Crona.

REGULAR.description:
Empowered by black blood, Crona proves difficult to defeat. With their survival on the line, Maka and Soul push themselves to the brink of madness.

REGULAR.description:
Maka’s fight with Crona takes a very surprising turn when she puts herself in danger, hoping her actions will free the odd little Meister from a life of pain.

titles.title: La Mia Anima lo Raggiungerà! Un cuore assetato in una solitudine insopportabile?

Va, mon âme. Un cœur sec dans une insupportable solitude...?
届け, 私の魂 ~渇いた心, たまらない孤独の中で...?~

REGULAR.description:
Free and Eruka are perilously close to releasing Asura - close enough to witness a terrifying display of the Kishin’s madness and power.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der Schrein des Siegels
Fuuin no Yashiro: Fujimi no Otoko ga Shikaketa Karakuri?
Il santuario del sigillo. La trappola preparata dall`uomo immortale?
Le sanctuaire du scellé. Le piège laissé par l`immortel ?
The Seal Shrine: The Immortal Man`s Tricks?
封印の社 ~不死身の男が仕掛けたからくり?~

REGULAR.description:
Dr. Stein and Medusa’s fight reaches a deadly climax, but the battle still rages in Asura’s chamber - if Black☆Star and Kid can’t defeat Eruka and Free, the Kishin will be unsealed.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dead or Alive! Fukkatsu to Genkaku no Hazama de?
Dead or Alive: In the Rift Between Revival and Dazzlement?
Death or alive! La rinascita tra le illusioni?
Mort ou Vif ! Entre résurrection et hallucinations ?
Tot oder lebendig
デッド オア アライブ! ~復活と幻覚の狭間で?~

REGULAR.description:
Free from his underground prison, Asura unleashes his terrible powers on Death City! High in the air, above the destruction, Death himself engages the Kishin in battle.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kamigami no Tatakai: Death City Houkai no Kiki ni?
Kampf der Götter
La battaglia delle divinità - Death City rischia il collasso?
Le combat des dieux. Death City au bord de la destruction ?

REGULAR.description:
The Death Scythes convene to hear Death’s plan for dealing with the escaped Kishin. Death also shares his concerns with that Dr. Stein might be slipping back into his old ways.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Death Scythes à l`appel ! Il faut empêcher la mutation de papa !!?
Einberufung
Il raduno delle Falci della morte! Impedire la ricollocazione di papà?
Shoushuu! Death Scythes: Fusege Papa no Jinji Idou!!?

召集! デスサイズス ~ふせげパパの人事異動!!?~

REGULAR.description:
Maka, Soul, and Crona investigate rumors of recent attacks by a massive earthen golem. Serious danger arises, and Death Weapon Meister Academy’s newest student stands up to the threat.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Spannender und peinlicher Probeunterricht
The Exciting and Embarrassing Trial Enrollment! The DWMA New Lifestyle Support Fair Is Open?
Une rentrée dans la joie et la prostration ! Une cellule de soutien pour une nouvelle vie à Shibusen ?
Ureshi Hazukashi Taiken Nyuugaku! Shibusen Shinseikatsu Ouen Fair Kaisaichuu?
嬉し恥ずかし体験入学! ~死武専新生活応援フェア開催中?~

REGULAR.description:
Death’s students find an ally in their battle against Giriko - the youngest Death Scythe, Justin Law. Unfortunately, Giriko gets some help too - after 800 years, the witch Arachne is awakened!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 800 Jahre Blutdurst
800 Nen no Satsui: Itan no Majo Kourin?
800 Years of Bloodlust: Advent of the Heretic Witch?

Un désir de meurtre de 800 ans. La venue de la sorcière hérétique ?

REGULAR.description:
Sid’s secret sabotage mission into Arachne’s research facility is jeopardized when Black☆Star arrives. Hoping to avenge Maka, the hot-headed Meister is looking for a fight - and Mifune is ready to oblige.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der Schwertgott erhebt sich
Kenshi Tatsu - Aji wa Amai ka Shoppai ka?
Le dieu de l`épée revient. Un goût de sucre ou de sel ?
The Sword God Rises: Does It Have a Sweet or Salty Taste?

REGULAR.description:
Dr. Stein’s trying to whip the Meisters and Weapons into shape for their eventual fight against Arachne. They’ll definitely need to toughen up - Arachne isn’t the only witch who’s back on the scene.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Fukkatsu no Medusa! Kumo to Hebi, Innen no Saikai?
La rinascita di Medusa. Ragno e serpente, una riunione predestinata?
Medusa`s Revival! A Spider and Snake`s Fateful Reunion?

Médusa ressuscitée ! Les retrouvailles fatidiques de l`araignée et du serpent ?
剣復活のメデューサ! ~蜘蛛と蛇, 因縁の再会?~

REGULAR.description:
Under the desert sun, Death the Kid and the Thompsons fight Fisher King for a Magic Tool that’s kept a train running for a century. When Death the Kid learns who made the device, it stops him in his tracks.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der rasende Express
Le train express lancé à toute berzingue ! L`artefact laissé par le grand architecte ensorceleur ?
Shakunetsu no Bousou Tokkyuu! Dai Madoushi ga Nokoshita Madougu?
The Red Hot Runaway Express: A Magic Tool Left Behind by the Great Wizard?
灼熱の暴走特急! ~大魔導師が残した魔道具?~

REGULAR.description:
Crona’s basking in the love offered so freely by the other students at DWMA. But when Medusa appears and orders Crona to do her bidding, the chill of old fear might overpower the warmth of new friendship.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Arida felicità. Di chi sono le lacrime che brillano al chiaro di luna?
Bonheur tari. À qui sont ces larmes qui brillent au clair de lune ?
Drying Happiness! Whose Tears Sparkle in the Moonlight?
Kareru Koufuku: Tsukiakari ni Hikaru no wa Dare no Namida?
Vertrocknetes Glück
涸れた幸福 ~月明かりに光るのは誰の涙?~

REGULAR.description:
The Holy Sword is unleashed! Hero tires of the other students at DWMA taking advantage of him, so he teams up with Excalibur to rule the school. Seriously!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die Legende vom Heiligen Schwert 3
La leggenda della Sacra Spada 3. La storia del bullo della Shibusen?
La légende de l`Épée Sacrée 3. La petite frappe de Shibusen ?
Legend of the Holy Sword 3: The Academy Gang Leader`s Tale?
Seiken Densetsu 3: Shibusen Banchou Monogatari?
聖剣伝説3 ~死武専番長物語?~

REGULAR.description:
With Arachnophobia on the verge of starting a war, Dr. Stein intensifies the students’ training. But before the gang can fully prepare for combat, a battle must be fought - between Maka and Black☆Star!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kettenresonanz
Kyoumei Rensa: Kanadero, Tamashii-tachi no Senritsu?
Resonance Link: Play the Melody of the Souls?
Risonanza a catena. Suonare la melodia della anime?
Résonance en chaîne. Jouez la mélodie des âmes ?
共鳴連鎖 ~奏でろ, 魂たちの旋律?~

REGULAR.description:
War erupts in a frozen wasteland! An army of DWMA staff, Weapons, and Meisters battle the forces of Arachnophobia for control of Brew, the greatest of Eibon’s creations.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: BREW争奪戦! ~激突, 死武専vsアラクノフォビア?~
Brew Soudatsusen! Gekitotsu, Shibusen vs. Arachnophobia?
Kampf um Brew
La bataille pour l`Infusio ! Shibusen contre Arachnophobia ?
La contesa del Brew. Scontro Shibusen contro Arachnophobia?
The Battle for Brew: Clash - The DWMA vs. Arachnophobia?

REGULAR.description:
Maka, Black☆Star, Death the Kid, and their Weapons engage Mosquito within the magnetic field. With even their strongest attacks falling short, Soul is forced to consider a risky move.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Arashi no Mosquito! Arishi Hi no Sekai, Seigen Jikan wa 10ppun?
Mosquito la Tornade ! L`ancien monde, temps limite : 10 Minutes ?
Mosquito`s Storm! Ten Minutes to Fight in the World of the Past?
Sturmwind Mosquito!
Uragano Mosquito! Il mondo dei giorni passati. Il tempo limite è 10 minuti?
嵐のモスキート! ~在りし日の世界, 制限時間は10分?~

REGULAR.description:
Soul’s gamble pays off, allowing a magnificent display of resonance against Mosquito and unlocking unseen levels of power within Maka. But it might not be enough to keep Brew out of the wrong hands.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Eco delle sette anime disattivato. Il concerto della creazione e della distruzione?
Entfessle die Kettenresonanz von sieben Seelen
Hanate, 7 Nin no Kyoumei Rensa! Hakai to Souzou no Ensoukai?
Résonance en chaîne ! Concert de création et de destruction ?
Unleash the Seven`s Resonance Link! A Recital of Destruction and Creation?
放て, 7人の共鳴連鎖! ~破壊と創造の演奏会?~

REGULAR.description:
Following the battle to claim Brew, Arachne moves forward with her plan, and the students of DWMA try to recover from defeat. Meanwhile, Death the Kid confronts Dr. Stein with some burning questions.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der erste Fall des Meisterdetektivs
Il primo caso del grande investigatore! Kid svelerà i segreti della Shibusen?
La première affaire du grand détective. Kid dévoile les secrets de Shibusen ?
Meitantei Dai Ichi no Jiken: Kid ga Abaku Shibusen no Himitsu?
The Detective`s First Case: Kid Exposes the DWMA`s Secret?
名探偵第一の事件 ~キッドが暴く死武専の秘密?~

REGULAR.description:
Death the Kid’s dealing with a lot: he suspects Joe’s involved with the Magic Tools mystery, and he’s forced into yet another brutal fight with depressed Black☆Star.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Asura`s Temptation: The Big Man`s Uncontrollable Irritation?
Die Versuchung des Ashura
La tentazione di Asura! L`incontenibile collera del più grande?
Shura e no Yuuwaku: Big na Otoko no Osaerarenai Iradachi?
Tentation sanglante. L`irrépressible colère du gars le plus géant ?
修羅への誘惑 ~ビッグな男の抑えられない苛立ち?~

REGULAR.description:
Arachne risks her life to gain a new ally in the plot against DWMA. Meanwhile, when Crona runs away from the school, Maka sets out to bring her friend back safely.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chrona reißt aus
Crona, Toubou: Kudasai, Kimi no Hohoemi?
Crona`s Escape: Show Me Your Smile, Please?
La fuga di Crona! Fai un sorriso,per favore?
La fuite de Crona. Montre-moi ton sourire ?

REGULAR.description:
Medusa offers Death a deal: in exchange for her release, she’ll reveal the Kishin’s location. The Grim Reaper won’t have long to decide - Arachne is on the verge of releasing madness on a global scale!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die Karten werden neu gemischt
Kirareta Card: Medusa, Shibusen ni Toukou Suru?
Redistribution des cartes. Médusa se rend à Shibusen ?

The Cards Are Cut: Medusa Surrenders to the DWMA?
切られたカード ~メデューサ, 死武専に投降する?~

REGULAR.description:
Dr. Stein’s mind is deteriorating quickly. As he explores his mental landscape for a way out of the increasing madness, Crona begs Death for a chance to right past wrongs.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Alles dreht sich
Gira e rigira. Il dottore balla in un nuovo mondo?
Kuru Kuru Kururu: Hakase wa Odoru, Atarashiki Sekai?
Tourne tourne et tourne. Le docteur danse, le nouveau monde ?
Twirl `Round and `Round: A New World in Which the Doc Dances?
クルクルクルル ~博士は踊る, 新しき世界?~

REGULAR.description:
The forces of DWMA prepare to open several fronts in the war against Arachnophobia - but Maka decides the time has arrived to fight a very personal battle of her own design!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Angriff auf Baba Yagas Burg
Assalto al castello di Baba Yaga! Perché è così poco chiaro?
Charge Baba Yaga`s Castle! Things Are Kind of Gloomy?
Shingeki! Baba Yaga no Shiro: Nanka Moyamoya suru?
À l`assaut du château Baba Yaga! Un vague à l`âme ?
進撃! ババ・ヤガーの城 ~なんかモヤモヤする?~

REGULAR.description:
Maka and Soul continue their search for Medusa’s lair. Meanwhile, a clash with the creepy guardians of the final Magic Tool leaves Death the Kid even more suspicious of his father’s true motives.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Das letzte magische Werkzeug
L`ultimo artefatto demoniaco. Mission Impossible per un Kid disarmato?
Le dernier artefact ! Mission impossible pour un Kid désarmé ?
Saigo no Madougu: Bukinashi Kid no Mission Impossible?
The Last Magic Tool: Mission Impossible for Unarmed Kid?
最後の魔道具 ~武器無しキッドのミッションインポッシブル?~

REGULAR.description:
Physical pain and mental anguish are guaranteed when Crona and Marie enter the treacherous confines of Medusa’s lair to confront the little witch and the insane Dr. Stein.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die Entschlossenheit der Schwäche
La determinazione di quel vigliacco di Crona.Per te che sei sempre dalla mia parte?
La résolution de Crona la mauviette ! Pour toi qui as toujours été à mes côtés ?
Weakling Crona`s Determination: For You, for Always Being by My Side?
Yowamushi Crona no Ketsui: Itsumo Soba ni itekureta Kimi ni?
弱虫クロナの決意 ~いつもそばにいてくれた君に?~

REGULAR.description:
Crona is forced to make the ultimate sacrifice as the battle against Medusa rages on. If the witch is to be destroyed, and Dr. Stein saved, Maka and Soul must reach rare heights of power.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Anti-Magic Wavelength: Fierce Attack, the Anger-Filled Genie Hunter?
Die Anti-Magie-Seelenwelle
La longueur d`onde anti-démon ! Le Tranche-Démon de la colère ?
Taima no Hachou: Moukou, Okori no Majingari?
退魔の波長 ~猛攻, 怒りの魔人狩り?~

REGULAR.description:
The final confrontation between Black☆Star and Mifune begins! As the warriors clash, Mifune reveals a startling connection to the young Meister’s past.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bu ka Shura ka: Kessen, Mifune vs Black*Star?
Guerriero o demonio? La battaglia decisiva:Mifune vs. Black Star?
Krieger oder Ashura?
Voie du guerrier ou voie du sang ! Combat final entre Mifune et Black Star ?
Warrior or Slaughterer? Showdown: Mifune vs. Black*Star?
武か修羅か ~決戦, ミフネvsブラック☆スター?~

REGULAR.description:
After the fight between Black☆Star and Mifune ends, the DWMA gains a powerful new ally. And when Death utilizes Brew in an astounding way, he turns the tides of the battle against Arachnophobia.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der wundersame Beistelltischchen-Flip
Kiseki no Chabudaigaeshi: Tobe! Bokura no Death City Robo?
Retourné de crêpe miraculeux ! Vole ! Mon robot Death City ?
The Miraculous Coffee Table Flip: Fly, Our Death City Robot?
Un capovolgimento miracoloso. Vola! Il robot di Death City?
奇跡のちゃぶ台返し ~僕らのデス・シティーロボ?~

REGULAR.description:
The Kishin and the Grim Reaper tear into each other with unimaginable levels of power. Before this ultimate clash between good and evil concludes, great sacrifices will be made.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Death Scythe o Motta Shinigami-sama: Issun Saki wa Yami Darake?
Der Shinigami-sama mit seiner Death Scythe
La falce della morte del Sommo Shinigami. Che cosa ci riserva il domani?
Lord Death Wields a Death Scythe: Just One Step from Utter Darkness?
Maitre Shinigami armé de sa Death Scythe ! Futur incertain ?
武器[デスサイズ]を持った死神様 ~一寸先はヤミだらけ?~

REGULAR.description:
Arachnophobia is crumbling, but the Kishin is stronger than ever.  Maka, Death the Kid, Black☆Star, and their Weapons attack with all their might, but when Soul slips into unconsciousness, all could be lost.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Asura Kakusei: Sekai no Ikitsuku Hate e?
Asura Wakes: To the End of the World?
Das Erwachen des Ashura
Il risveglio di Asura. L`arrivo della fine del mondo?
L`éveil d`Asura ! La destination finale du monde ?
阿修羅覚醒 ~世界の行き着く果てへ?~

REGULAR.description:
Maka struggles to save Soul, but even if she manages to bring her partner back from the edge of insanity, it might be too late to rescue Black☆Star, Death the Kid, and their Weapons from the Kishin!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ichi ka Bachi ka?! Kami o Koeru Otoko-tachi?
Le tout pour le tout ?! Les hommes qui transcendent Dieu ?
O la va o la spacca! L`uomo che trascende gli Dei?
Sink or Swim?! The Men Who Transcend the Gods?
Vabanquespiel?
イチかバチか?! ~神を超える男たち?~

REGULAR.description:
With her friends fallen, Maka must find the strength to face the Kishin alone. The world is in jeopardy and evil is poised for certain victory - until something stirs deep inside the young Meister’s heart.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Aikotoba wa Yuuki!
Die Parole heißt Mut
La parola d`ordine è coraggio!
Le mot de passe est courage !
The Word Is Bravery!
合言葉は勇気!
